00108     public function Select ( $fields, $options )
00109         {
00110                 $selectQuery = 'SELECT ';
00111                 
00112                 if ( is_array( $fields ) ) 
00113                 {
00114                         foreach( $fields as $field ) 
00115                         {
00116                                 $selectQuery .= $field;
00117                         }
00118                         
00119                         $selectQuery = substr( $selectQuery, 0, -1 ) ;
00120                 }
00121                 else
00122                 {
00123                         $selectQuery .= $fields;
00124                 }
00125                 
00126                 $selectQuery .= ' FROM `'.$this->tableName.'` '.$options;
00127                 
00128                 return $this->bDDConnection->Query ( $selectQuery ) ;
00129         } //---- End of Select
00130         
00141     public function Insert ( BDDRecord $record )
00142         {
00143                 $newRecord = $this->bDDRecordToTableRecord ( $record );
00144                 unset( $record );
00145                 
00146                 $insertQuery  = 'INSERT INTO `'.$this->tableName.'` SET ';
00147                 
00148                 foreach ( $newRecord as $champ  => $value )
00149                 {
00150                         $insertQuery .= $champ.' = "'. $this->EscapeValue( $value ) .'", ';
00151                 }
00152                 
00153                 $insertQuery = substr ( $insertQuery , 0 , -2 );
00154                 
00155                 return $this->bDDConnection->Query ( $insertQuery ) ;
00156         } //---- End of Insert
00157         
00171     public function Update ( BDDRecord $updatedRec, $clause )
00172         {
00173                 $newRecord = $this->bDDRecordToTableRecord ( $updatedRec );
00174                 unset( $updatedRec );
00175                 
00176                 $updateQuery  = 'UPDATE `'.$this->tableName.'` SET ';
00177                 
00178                 foreach ( $newRecord as $champ  => $value )
00179                 {
00180                         $updateQuery .= $champ.' = "'. $this->EscapeValue( $value ) .'", ';
00181                 }
00182                 
00183                 $updateQuery = substr ( $updateQuery , 0 , -2 ) . $clause;
00184                 
00185                 return $this->bDDConnection->Query ( $updateQuery ) ;
00186         
00187         } //---- End of Update
00188         
00200     public function Delete ( $clauses )
00201         {
00202                 return $this->bDDConnection->Query ( 'DELETE FROM `'.$this->tableName.'` WHERE '.$clause );
00203         } //---- End of Delete

00213     public function Clear (  )
00214         {
00215                 return $this->bDDConnection->Query ( 'DELETE FROM `'.$this->tableName.'`' );
00216         } //---- End of Clear

00241                 return mysql_escape_string( $value );

00284         protected function isValidProperty ( $property )
00285         {
00286                 foreach ( $this->structure as $champ )
00287                 {
00288                         if ( $champ->getProperty( MySQLTable::MYSQL_STRUCTURE_FIELD_NAME ) == $property )
00289                         {
00290                                 return true;
00291                         }
00292                 }
00293                 
00294                 return false;
00295         } //----- End of isValidProperty
00296         
00305         protected function bDDRecordToTableRecord ( BDDRecord $record )
00306         {
00307                 $tableRecord = new BDDRecord();
00308                 
00309                 foreach ( $record as $champ => $value ) 
00310                 {
00311                         if ( $this->isValidProperty( $champ ) )
00312                         {
00313                                 $tableRecord->SetProperty ( $champ , mysql_real_escape_string ( $value, $this->bDDConnection ) );
00314                         }
00315                 }
00316                 
00317                 return $tableRecord;
00318         } //----- End of bDDRecordToTableRecord
